thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Lockheed to offer Japan stealthy hybrid jet

title: EXCLUSIVE: Lockheed to offer Japan stealthy hybrid jet
text:
EXCLUSIVE: Lockheed to offer Japan stealthy hybrid jet 12:03pm BST - 01:43 
American defense contractor Lockheed Martin plans to offer Japan a new hybrid stealth fighter jet. Two sources exclusively told Reuters the new plane would be based on Lockheed's export-banned F-22 Raptor and the advanced F-35.   
American defense contractor Lockheed Martin plans to offer Japan a new hybrid stealth fighter jet. Two sources exclusively told Reuters the new plane would be based on Lockheed's export-banned F-22 Raptor and the advanced F-35.  //reut.rs/2K0N5tX
